name: The Next Step Dance Battles
description:
- The Next Step Dance Battles is a fun Rhythm Game that lets you play favourite songs from The Next Step and tap along to win!
- Think you know the music back to front? Take on the hardest songs to prove you’re worthy of A-Troupe!
- Stuck on a song? Unlock Boosts to help when you’re having
trouble.
- Battle your friends by challenging them to beat your high score!

This game features 20 Free Hit Songs from the show. Achieve at least 1 star per song to unlock the next.

In-App Purchases:
----------------------------
5 Diamonds
15 Diamonds
40 Diamonds


*Note:
The Next Step Dance Battles is a free download that allows you to unlock all 20 songs for free but there are optional in-app purchases available (diamond) that allow you to purchase in game boosts that help achieve a higher game score

Important Message for Parents
-------------------------------------
This app may include:
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
